name: Defensive Weapon Training
descriptionText: You know how to defend yourself against a certain class of weaponry.
benefitText: Choose a weapon group from the fighter's weapon training class ability list (except natural weapons). You gain a +2 dodge bonus on AC when an opponent attacks you using a weapon from that group. If you also have the weapon training class feature in the selected group, your dodge bonus from this feat increases to +3.
specialText: You can select this feat more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time you select this feat, it applies to a different weapon group.
